content.text: From July 8-9, 2025, the elizaOS/eliza repository showed significant activity with 42 new pull requests (35 of which were merged), 3 new issues, and 13 active contributors participating in the project.
PR #5436 by @lalalune titled 'feat: add action chaining' is merged, introducing functionality for chaining actions together.
PR #5440 by @wtfsayo titled 'chore: 1.0.20' is merged, updating the version number to 1.0.20.
PR #5444 by @tcm390 titled 'fix: replace all window.confirm usages with useConfirmation across GUI' is merged, improving confirmation dialogs throughout the interface.
PR #5478 by @wtfsayo titled 'Merge develop into main' is merged, synchronizing the development branch with the main branch.
PR #5477 by @wtfsayo titled 'fix: resolve SPA routing for globally installed CLI' is merged, addressing single-page application routing issues.
PR #5433 titled 'fix textual inconsistencies in files' is merged, correcting various text inconsistencies throughout the codebase.
PR #5480 titled 'chore: merge develop to main' is merged, bringing development changes into the main branch.
PR #5479 titled 'fix: improve SPA routing for globally installed CLI' is merged, enhancing single-page application routing for CLI installations.
PR #5476 titled 'Release v1.1.4: Merge develop to main' is merged, releasing version 1.1.4 with development changes.
PR #5475 titled 'fix: SPA routing fallback and nested button hydration error' is merged, resolving routing fallbacks and button hydration issues.
PR #5474 titled 'chore 1.1.3' is merged, updating the version to 1.1.3.
PR #5473 titled 'chore: 1.1.3' is merged, bumping the version to 1.1.3.
PR #5472 titled 'fix: improve client path resolution for global CLI installations' is merged, enhancing path resolution for CLI installations.
PR #5471 titled 'fix: add bun.lock to .gitignore' is merged, updating the gitignore file to exclude bun.lock.
PR #5470 titled 'chore: 1.1.2' is merged, updating the version to 1.1.2.
PR #5469 titled 'fix: handle SPA routing on refresh without NotFoundError' is merged, improving page refresh handling without errors.
PR #5468 titled 'chore: merge main to develop' is merged, synchronizing the main branch with the development branch.
PR #5467 titled 'fix(ci): resolve release workflow failures and simplify post-publish steps' is merged, improving CI release processes.
PR #5466 titled 'fix(ci): resolve Lerna publish failure in release workflow' is merged, addressing Lerna publishing issues in CI.
PR #5463 titled 'fix: commit lerna changes' is merged, ensuring Lerna changes are properly committed.
PR #5461 titled 'fix: bump versions in lerna before build' is merged, correcting version bumping sequence in the build process.
PR #5460 titled 'fix: remove skip-verification flag from plugin test commands' is merged, improving plugin testing verification.
PR #5459 titled 'fix: add explicit boolean conversion for environment variable checks' is merged, enhancing environment variable handling.
PR #5458 titled 'fix: remove dup body parser, "stream is not readable"' is merged, resolving duplicate body parser issues.
PR #5457 titled 'chore: refine chat opening toasts for clarity' is merged, improving notification messages when opening chats.
PR #5455 titled 'fix: repeated DM creation on refresh by clearing forceNew state' is merged, preventing duplicate direct messages on page refresh.
PR #5454 titled 'fix: update create command helper text + warning msg' is merged, improving command help text and warnings.
PR #5453 titled 'fix: merge duplicate model logging into a single adapter.log call' is merged, optimizing logging for models.
PR #5450 titled 'fix: prevent global plugin installations' is merged, adding restrictions on global plugin installations.
PR #5448 titled 'feat(cli): update dev instructions to include elizaos command option' is merged, enhancing developer documentation.
PR #5446 titled 'feat: image gen action' is merged, adding image generation functionality.
PR #5445 titled 'fix: improve code formatting in client components' is merged, enhancing code formatting standards.
PR #5443 titled 'feat(cli): remove --dir flag from create command' is merged, simplifying the create command interface.
PR #5442 titled 'fix: starter avatar' is merged, addressing issues with default avatar images.
PR #5441 titled 'chore: bump version to 1.0.19' is merged, updating the version to 1.0.19.
PR #5437 titled 'fix: Windows plugin loading and dev command failures (#5407)' is merged, resolving Windows-specific plugin and development issues.
Issue #5452 titled 'v1 to v2 character migrator' by @borisudovicic is OPEN
Issue #5447 titled 'should not show update availble during update command' by @linear is OPEN
Issue #5438 titled 'Set up rate limited Eliza hosted LLM and embedding endpoint' by @borisudovicic is OPEN
The repository elizaOS/eliza has a list of top contributors, though specific contributor details are not provided in the input.
